original_title: Cardinal Sin… Seven Decades of Sin by Fr. James B. Reuter, SJ
overview: This video production captured the stage presentation on the life of Manila’s revered Archbishop, Jaime Cardinal Sin. The stage-play written and directed by Fr. James B. Reuter, SJ features the childhood years of the Cardinal up to his years in the seminary and into his assumption of the position as Archbishop of Manila.
title: Cardinal Sin… Seven Decades of Sin by Fr. James B. Reuter, SJ
